channel.title: Pages on ewenme
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on ewenme

item.title: Projects
item.description: Software ghibli: Studio Ghibli colour palettes for R fplR: R package for working with Fantasy Premier League (FPL) data Web Applications polMonitor: Shiny app for monitoring police violence Vinylspotting: Shiny app for Discogs users to visualise and explore their record collections

item.title: About
item.description: Ewen (pronounced you-n). R fanboy and advocate for open source / open science. Telling empathetic stories about my diverse excursions in data science. Otherwise, find me listening to weird ‘n’ dusty records and sinking into a Discogs wormhole.
